creator: jie.han@163.com
text:
Created attachment 23324
TextShape with border (border width 0.75p)

In the slide if the the border width of the shape is  0.75p the getLineWidth function returns 0.0.  In other condition it works fine is it the bug inside the function?

creator: yegor@dinom.ru
text:
Fixed in r786577

PowerPoint doesn't store a value if line width has the default value (0.75). In such cases the width property is missing and getLineWidth returned 0.

Yegor
